sentences.english: I read about his death and memorial service, but very little information was given.
sentences.chinese: 我聞悉他的死亡和紀念儀式，但提供了很少信息。

sentences.english: You thanked her by reading about the problems parents make for their children.
sentences.chinese: 您感謝了她由聞悉父母做爲他們的孩子的問題。

sentences.english: You can then read about the concepts behind the skills you'll learn in the cockpit.
sentences.chinese: 您能然後聞悉概念在您將學會在駕駛艙內的技能之後。
